page.title: 08 GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
{KNOCK DOWN GINGER { { Knock Down Ginger}is a game where you knock on somone's door and run away.It's best to do it at{night}so that they don't see you when you run away,and it's best to do it in a closed area.By the way its{illegal.} It's best to do it in a group so if you get caught you blame it on to your friend .
{FORTY FORTY {Forty,Forty}is a game for all ages and any number of children. You don't have to be a fast runner, or have brains but you must be able to hide.First you choose a person to count to{40,}while the others hide. Then they look for you. You must try to get home first and say,"40-40 home."If you don't they say,"40-40 seen you."
